author: John Hayward, John Hayward
title: Brazil Builds Its Own Ventilators After China Fails to Deliver Shipments
description: Brazilian Health Minister Luiz Henrique Mandetta told a news conference on Wednesday that China is shipping very few of the ventilators Brazil ordered for victims of the Wuhan coronavirus, so bids from Brazilian companies are now being solicited to build the …
